page.title: 04 TRANSPORT SURVEY
page.content: There are a lot of cars on the housing estates.We surveyed one hundred households to obtain the following information. Eight per cent of house holds had no cars,sixty per cent had one car and thirty two per cent had two or more cars.Ten per cent of people had cars under one year old. Twenty per cent had cars less than two years old.Sixty per cent of people had cars less than five years old.There were only two cars over thirteen years old. Only twenty five per cent of people surveyed use public transport.Over sixty two per cent of households have more than one person in employment. This may explain why most people have more than one car. Three of the eight people who have no car are retiried.
